TopicTitle: I lost all of my saved rockets!

Articles.Content:
I created a new workspace name and then suddenly all of my saved rockets were gone.

How do I get them back?!?!

 

I still see saved data under:

AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\Saves\SinglePlayer

So I know they are not lost but the game is not loading and showing them.  I closed entirely, and re-opened the game already.
